Dialogue.dialogueline: Calm down please! I’m here to deal with this company, im trying to gather information.
Dialogue.name: Player

Dialogue.dialogueline: Sure Mr.Sherlock, I’m not exactly a kid to fall for something like that.
Dialogue.name: Accountant Chief

Dialogue.dialogueline: I mean it! I know whats happening to you, if you can tell me more about the blackmailer I promise to not tell about the money.
Dialogue.name: Player

Dialogue.dialogueline: I-… well, you make a great point… Look, I don’t want to get my daughter in trouble because some shining knight wants to bring the big bad Corporation down, I don’t want to be involved in your little investigation, so ill just say its one of the higher-ups, now leave before I change my mind.
Dialogue.name: Accountant Chief
